title: A Nico Nii Course
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Dia…. don’t you want to grow more than you are right now as a school idol….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I want to. I work hard every day to achieve that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Don’t you want to know something that only Nico Nii could teach you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Something that only you can teach, Nico-san….? And you’re going to teach it to me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yes. If you’re prepared, that is, Dia…. But, it’ll be tough, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I expect nothing less<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Nico Nico Nii-! Nico Nico Nii-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Put some more sweetness in your voice! Be mindful of your hands up to your fingertips! Don’t be shy!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Nico Nico Nii~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s the way…. There was this one time in the past when I heard a voice that was able to reproduce this “Nico Nico Nii~” perfectly. In the end, I didn’t get to know who that was, but it was a truly magnificent copy…. You’ll rise up to that height too, Dia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
